code: import React from"react";import"./style.css";import'@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShareCard=_ref=>{let{link,onClose}=_ref;const shareOnSocial=platform=>{const urls={facebook:`https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=${link}`,twitter:`https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=${link}`,linkedin:`https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?url=${link}`};window.open(urls[platform],"_blank");};const copyToClipboard=()=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(link);alert("Link copiado!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"share-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"share-card-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"share-card-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-btn",onClick:onClose,children:"\xD7"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"subtitulo2 themePurple",children:"Compartilhe"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"share-options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>shareOnSocial("facebook"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-facebook"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>shareOnSocial("twitter"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-twitter"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>shareOnSocial("linkedin"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-linkedin"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:link,readOnly:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"copy-btn",onClick:copyToClipboard,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fi fi-rr-copy"})})]})]})});};export default ShareCard;
